text: Kare-ra wa, kare (yusufu) no shitagi o itsuwarino chi de (yogoshi) motte kita. Kare (yaakobu) wa itta. `Iya, iya, anata gataga jibun-tachi no tame ni (taihen'na koto o an'i ni kangaete), kon'na kotoni shita nodearu. Sorede (watashi to shite wa) taeshinobu no ga bitokuda. Anata gata no noberu koto ni tsuite wa,(tada) arra ni o tasuke o o negai suru
